ants

Class AntGameObject

  • java.lang.Object
    • ants.AntGameObject
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Ant, AntFoodSpawn, AntHill, AntWall

    public class AntGameObject
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a game object specific to the game of ants. A game object is an entity used to implement the way the game works. A game object is positioned on a game map. Some game objects can be moved.
    Author:
    Benjamin

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected int col
      The column identifier of the game object.
      private boolean collideable
      Whether the game object can share a cell with another game object.
      private boolean movable
      Whether the game object can be moved on the map.
      private AntGameMapCallback moveHandler
      The handler used to move the game object on the game map.
      protected int row
      The row identifier of the game object.

    • Field Detail

      • col

        protected int col
        The column identifier of the game object.

      • row

        protected int row
        The row identifier of the game object.

      • movable

        private boolean movable
        Whether the game object can be moved on the map.

      • collideable

        private boolean collideable
        Whether the game object can share a cell with another game object. collideable = true; means that the game object cannot share its cell with another game object.

      • moveHandler

        private AntGameMapCallback moveHandler
        The handler used to move the game object on the game map.

    • Constructor Detail

      • AntGameObject

        public AntGameObject(AntGameMapCallback moveHandler,
                     int col,
                     int row,
                     boolean movable,
                     boolean collideable)
        Creates a new game object from a column and a row identifier.
        Parameters:
        moveHandler - the handler used to move the game object on the game map.
        col - the initial column identifier of the game object.
        row - the initial row identifier of the game object.
        movable - true if the game object can be moved on the map.
        collideable - false if the game object can share a cell with another one.

      • AntGameObject

        public AntGameObject(AntGameMapCallback moveHandler,
                     Cell cell,
                     boolean movable,
                     boolean collideable)
        Creates a new game object from a cell descriptor.
        Parameters:
        moveHandler - the handler used to move the game object on the game map.
        cell - the cell descriptor that positions the game object on the map.
        movable - true if the game object can be moved on the map.
        collideable - false if the game object can share a cell with another one.

    • Method Detail

      • move

        public void move(Move direction)
        Moves the game object on the map to the given direction.
        Parameters:
        direction - where to move the game object.

      • toJSONArray

        public org.json.JSONArray toJSONArray()
        Gets a JSON representation of the game object.
        Returns:
        the game object as a JSON array.

        Gets the row identifier of the game object.

        the row identifier of the game object.

      • isMovable

        public boolean isMovable()
        Returns whether a game object can be moved on the map.
        Returns:
        true if it is possible to move the game object, false otherwise.

      • isCollideable

        public boolean isCollideable()
        Returns whether the game object is collideable.
        Returns:
        true if the game object cannot share its cell with another game object.
